trans-unit.source: Serializes a connector layout.
trans-unit.target: Serializza un layout del connettore.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class is also useful for customizing the serialization of connectors of classes derived from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Questa classe è utile anche per personalizzare la serializzazione di connettori di classi derivate da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorLayoutSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorLayoutSerializer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified <xref:System.Type> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza dell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Type>utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> supporting this operation.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> supporta questa operazione.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Specificata <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di specificato <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: type is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: typeè un riferimento null ().

trans-unit.source: Gets a Dictionary collection filled with element name and their associated values from the current position in the xml reader associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta Dictionary contenente il nome dell'elemento e i relativi valori associati dalla posizione corrente nel lettore xml associato il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> che gestisce il processo di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Specificata <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Dictionary based collection containing the argument names and their associated values for the construction of the connector.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta contenente i nomi degli argomenti e i relativi valori associati per la costruzione del connettore è basata su dizionario.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves information about all properties associated with the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Recupera informazioni su tutte le proprietà associate all'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> che gestisce il processo di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to search for properties.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>per la ricerca delle proprietà.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A array that contains information about the properties associated with obj.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto matrice che contiene informazioni sulle proprietà associate obj .

trans-unit.source: serializationManager or obj contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serializationManagero obj contiene un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Performs processing of the object after the deserialization process.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'elaborazione dell'oggetto dopo il processo di deserializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> che gestisce il processo di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that was deserialized.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>che è stato deserializzato.</xref:System.Object>
